doc:
William Hudson (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Hudson_(actor) 0 William Woodson Hudson Jr. (January 24, 1919 - April 5, 1974) was an American actor best remembered for the role of Ranger Clark in Rocky Jones, Space Ranger and the role of Special Agent Mike Andrews in the Emmy Award nominated spy drama I Led Three Lives. William_Woodson_Hudson_Jr. ( January_24_,_1919 - April_5_,_1974 ) was an_American_actor_best remembered for the_role of Ranger_Clark in Rocky_Jones , Space_Ranger and the_role of Special_Agent_Mike_Andrews in the_Emmy_Award nominated spy_drama I Led Three_Lives .
